akn:section.akn:heading: Technical assistance to U.S. Customs and Border Protection

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1304a. Technical assistance to U.S. Customs and Border Protection The Secretary of Agriculture shall make available to U.S. Customs and Border Protection technical assistance related to the identification of produce represented as grown in the United States when it is not in fact grown in the United States. (Pub. L. 113–79, title XII, § 12309(a), Feb. 7, 2014, 128 Stat. 991.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was enacted as part of the Agricultural Act of 2014, and not as part of the Tariff Act of 1930 which comprises this chapter.
